backend/main.mo: Primary Motoko canister implementing land minting logic, data types, registries, access control, and game mechanics.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Instructions for force-reinstalling Land and Asset canisters on IC mainnet and re-initializing them after backing up data.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: High-level deployment checklist covering environment setup and required .env variables for the frontend.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Mainnet deployment guide for the Land Mint DApp detailing prerequisites and canister creation steps.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Brief instructions emphasizing correct deployment order for all five canisters.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Developer overview describing system architecture, five‑canister design, and core DApp functionality.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: Lists required frontend environment variables needed for proper network and canister configuration.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Setup guide for environment variables and backend canister deployment to fix missing‑ID and availability errors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing shader, fog, and renderer requirements tied to CubeVisualization.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping summarizing each frontend file’s functionality, styling, and component behavior.
frontend/.env: Mainnet‑configured environment variables including all canister IDs, admin principal, and stability settings.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment file showing required canister IDs, network settings, and admin/debug options.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React frontend via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling identity, actor initialization, profile loading, and rendering loading, reinitialization, or main UI states.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for asset backend API including assets, profiles, roles, and all asset-related canister methods.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL defining the asset backend canister interface for asset management, queries, admin functions, and user profiles.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL for the main backend canister defining roles, land data structures, gameplay mechanics, modifiers, and query/update methods.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: Admin-only GLB upload UI with health checks, authorization verification, drag‑and‑drop handling, and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel for uploading GLB files with health checks, file validation, and simulated upload progress.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Diagnostic tool running multiple tests against the asset canister including actor status, connectivity, permissions, and cycle balance.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: Admin-only tool that runs prechecks and reinitialization steps on the asset canister with status tracking and post-checks.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Runs connectivity and health diagnostics for land and asset canisters across multiple gateways and generates status reports.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: Compares expected canister IDs with current environment variables and displays correctness status per canister.
Validates required environment variables at runtime and shows a top-level error banner when critical config is missing.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Renders an animated 2D cosmic starfield and nebula background using a canvas element.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: Renders a biome‑based 3D scene with custom shaders, lighting sync, postprocessing bloom, and environment setup using react‑three‑fiber.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing; previous 3D logic was removed.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: Displays and periodically checks health of Land and Asset canisters, updating status and showing toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: Handles loading, discovering, and processing loot caches with token and charge checks, reacting via UI and toasts.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Provides a React error boundary that logs errors and displays a fallback UI when child components fail.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Implements staking, proposal creation, and voting flows with validation, mutation hooks, and user feedback.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Shows selected land data, cooldown timers, rewards claiming, upgrades, modifier usage, and admin debug tools.
Empty or missing content; no functionality shown.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: Loads and configures a GLTF land model with KTX2 textures, applies biome-based PBR tweaks, and auto-positions the camera.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: Renders a card UI for browsing land entries with previous/next controls and biome labels.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Displays the top 10 lands leaderboard with loading/error states and styled ranking rows.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Interactive map canvas supporting drag, pinch, zoom, and centering on user's land using react‑spring and gesture hooks.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Marketplace UI for listing, filtering, buying, and managing land and modifier items with mutation handlers.
Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Runs periodic asset‑canister health checks and displays connection status, latency, and uptime with expandable UI.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Renders an animated 2D canvas particle background with moving points and connecting lines, handling resize and cleanup.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: Provides UI to edit a land plot’s name and decoration URL, using mutation hooks to update backend data.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Displays a Plug Wallet connect button with dropdown for copying principal and disconnecting when connected.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Offers a simple form to set and save a user profile name with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Shows a fullscreen modal indicating network reconnection attempts with progress and gateway info.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches 3D rendering errors, logs them, and displays a fallback UI with reset option.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Defines mainnet configuration for canister IDs, asset URLs, wallet settings, and validation utilities.
Provides a React context for Plug wallet connection, managing connect/disconnect state and actor creation.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Exports a static list of placeholder modifier items with ids, names, tiers, and asset URLs.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and result types for interacting with the governance backend canister.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Defines the Candid IDL for the governance backend service including proposals, voting, and staking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance using Internet Identity and react-query, reinitializing on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Implements automatic actor reinitialization with gateway rotation, retries, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Wraps useActor with additional initialization logic, polling backend readiness and tracking initialization state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Validates environment, checks gateway health, and initializes an Asset canister actor with retries and failover.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: Performs a delayed health check against the asset canister and returns a simple health status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: Handles GLB file uploads to the asset canister using Plug wallet, tracking progress and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Initializes a governance canister actor with retries, gateway selection, and Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Initializes a marketplace canister actor with retries, gateway failover, and Internet Identity integration.
Provides generic Plug Wallet transaction hook and specific marketplace and governance transaction helpers with query invalidation and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements data-fetching and mutation hooks for land data, user profiles, token balances, and placeholders for governance and marketplace items using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: Initializes and manages a token canister actor with retry, gateway failover, and timeout logic using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styling, fonts, colors, neon effects, and dark-themed visual utilities for the app.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Generates build metadata, adds cache-busting parameters to URLs, and logs build information on startup.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Provides debug utilities for 3D rendering, performance logs, GPU diagnostics, and scene stability checks based on environment flags.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: Empty placeholder file for model-loading utilities.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Provides utilities to format and parse token amounts and add thousand separators for ICRC-1 tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for marketplace backend types, listing structures, and API methods.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Defines the Candid IDL factory for the marketplace canister, including item types, listings, and service methods.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Renders the modifier collection page with rarity tiers, counts, and a visual grid of planned modifiers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard with tab navigation, land data fetching, and module rendering for various game features.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the landing page with Internet Identity login flow and animated backgrounds.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Shows loading and success states for initializing land data before redirecting to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Provides a UI for verifying canister IDs with background visuals and navigation back to home.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the token backend canister, including account structures, transfer types, and admin methods.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: Defines Candid IDL types and service methods for token transfer, metadata, balance, supply, and minting.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: Provides TypeScript type declarations for WebGPU interfaces to enable compile-time support detection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, themes, plugins, and container settings.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, environment variables, WASM handling, cache-busted builds, aliases, and a dev proxy.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and feature requests focused on applying Studio Balance shader and fog settings in CubeVisualization.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian‑language deployment quickstart for installing dependencies and running CyberGenesis.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Mainnet upload script for GLB assets, including rate‑limited uploads, verification, and usage instructions.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Local script that uploads tiered GLB model assets to the AssetCanister using dfx and verifies the upload.
unknown.txt: Contains an incomplete line referencing testing a health endpoint.
